[{"id":"JT-49050","entityId":"25-2109841","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"49050"},{"name":"summary","value":"Switching between "tabs" with Alt+Ctrl can make comments disappear"},{"name":"description","value":"

STR:

  1. refresh the page
  2. press some tabs with Alt+Ctrl mouse click fast enough
  3. one tab will show changes from another (probably empty)

also i guess this brought another issue: JT-48868

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1535475158758,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-3054617","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-48810","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

I have reverted commit https://github.com/JetBrains/ring-ui/commit/79e60f9cfecbcfed763b7d28986ce5e3f1951987
because it doesn't solve the current problem and introduce new bugs JT-48868

Please don't use $timeout(..., 0) - this is anti patter

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1536141204586,"updated":1536141220716,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"JT-48790","entityId":"25-2095640","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48790"},{"name":"summary","value":"Can't add an Issue Distribution Report widget to a dashboard"},{"name":"description","value":"

STR:

  • go to a dashboard on hub.jetbrains.com
  • add the widget
  • select YouTrack
  • select New Report
  • enter a name for the report (I used "TestReport")
  • select Hub as a project
  • click Save

AR:

  • An error "Cannot save report: Property FlatDistributionReport.name is invalid" is shown
  • The json of the POST request doesn't include required data
{"$type":"jetbrains.youtrack.reports.impl.distribution.flat.gap.FlatDistributionReport","name":"","projects":[],"xsortOrder":"COUNT_INDEX_DESC","xaxis":{"field":{"$type":"jetbrains.charisma.keyword.PredefinedFilterField","id":"project","presentation":"project"}},"query":"","own":true}

ER: widget configuration ends successfully

It is reproducible only for case, when several YouTrack-servers attached to one Hub

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1536067462805,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48992","entityId":"25-2107731","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48992"},{"name":"summary","value":"Agile card: counter is not shown/updated until watchers list is opened"},{"name":"description","value":"

2018.2.44973:

Mostly the same as JT-48665

STR:

  1. Open any card on agile board.
  2. Star it
  3. Close it.
  4. Open it again

Expected result: in steps 2 and 4 I should eventually see the number of watchers
Actual result: watchers number is not shown until watchers dropdown is expanded
